feature.name: 360RPM
feature.description: Software based blade speed control set to 360 Rotations Per Minute (RPMs)

feature.name: 480RPM
feature.description: Software based blade speed control set to 480 Rotations Per Minute (RPMs)

feature.name: 720RPM
feature.description: Software based blade speed control set to 720 Rotations Per Minute (RPMs)

feature.name: MD
feature.description: MANUEL DRIVEN - Vehicle is pushed from behind (No required Software control in this configuration)

alt.name: MTD
alt.description: Mounted Vehicles Operation Mode (Human drives the Lawnmower)
Mounted Vehicles Operation Mode (Human drives the Lawnmower)

feature.name: RD
feature.description: Remotely Driven - Powered by an Electric Motor and Controlled by Automation or Remote

and.name: I-O-T Module
and.description: Internet Of Things Module - To enable Automation and deliver Mowing Insights trhough software generated reporting
Internet Of Things Module - To enable Automation and deliver Mowing Insights trhough software generated reporting

alt.name: OS
alt.description: Operating Systems from which user can access the IOT Module
Operating Systems from which user can access the IOT Module

and.name: Sensor
and.description: Sensors - Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Proximity sensor, Light Sensor
Sensors - Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Proximity sensor, Light Sensor

and.name: ASW
and.description: Automation Software(SW) - To Contain - Task Scheduler & Area Planner
Automation Software(SW) - To Contain - Task Scheduler & Area Planner

feature.name: AP
feature.description: Area Planner - Would manage the selection of areas to be mowned

alt.name: TS
alt.description: Task Scheduler - Would manage the scheduling of Mowing Tasks e.g. When, where and How many times peer day or week
Task Scheduler - Would manage the scheduling of Mowing Tasks e.g. When, where and How many times peer day or week

and.name: RG
and.description: Report Generator - To generate different reports on a Daily, Monthly and Yearly Basis

feature.name: RD-IOT
feature.description: Remotely Driven - Powered by an Electric Motor and Controlled by Automation or Remote
